name: AAVESHAM
description: Aavesham (transl. Excitement) is a 2024 Indian Malayalam-language gangster action comedy film written and directed by Jithu Madhavan.

name: VIKRAM
description: The film follows Vikram, the former commander of a black-ops squad's pilot batch, and his efforts to take down Sandhanam, the runner of a drug syndicate.

name: KILL
description: Kill is a 2023 Indian Hindi-language action thriller film written and directed by Nikhil Nagesh Bhat and produced by Dharma Productions.

name: SALAAR
description: The film follows the friendship between Deva (Prabhas), the exiled prince of Khansaar, and Varadha (Prithviraj Sukumaran), the current prince of Khansaar.

name: Squid Game
description: Hundreds of cash-strapped contestants accept an invitation to compete in children's games for a tempting prize, but the stakes are deadly.

name: LIGER
description: The film stars Vijay Deverakonda in a dual role as father and son, the titular MMA fighter “Liger” with stammering problems alongside

name: Queen of Tears
description: A gripping tale of love, loss, and resilience set against the backdrop of a war-torn my name ---hjdj nation The film stars Vijay Deverakonda .
